trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of the OLE DB <xref uid="langword_csharp_IRowsetNotify" name="IRowsetNotify" href=""></xref> interface for use by applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
Notifies the consumer of any change to the value of a column.
A pointer to the rowset, because the consumer may be receiving notifications from multiple rowsets and this identifies which one is calling.
The handle of the row in which the column value was changed.
The count of columns in `rgColumns`.
An array of columns in the row for which the value was changed.
The reason for the change, as indicated by the value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_DBREASON" name="DBREASON" href=""></xref>.
The phase of this notification.

When this flag is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the consumer cannot veto the event by returning <xref uid="langword_csharp_S_FALSE" name="S_FALSE" href=""></xref> because the provider cannot undo the event.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> representing the result.
Notifies the consumer of the first change to a row or of any change that affects the entire row.
A pointer to the rowset, because the consumer may be receiving notifications from multiple rowsets and this identifies which one is calling.
The count of row handles in `rghRows`.
An array of handles of rows that are changing.
The reason for the change, as indicated by the value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_DBREASON" name="DBREASON" href=""></xref>.
The phase of this notification.

When this flag is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the consumer cannot veto the event by returning <xref uid="langword_csharp_S_FALSE" name="S_FALSE" href=""></xref> because the provider cannot undo the event.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> representing the result.
Notifies the consumer of any change affecting the entire rowset.
A pointer to the rowset, because the consumer may be receiving notifications from multiple rowsets and this identifies which one is calling.
The reason for the change, as indicated by the value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_DBREASON" name="DBREASON" href=""></xref>.
The phase of this notification.

When this flag is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the consumer cannot veto the event by returning <xref uid="langword_csharp_S_FALSE" name="S_FALSE" href=""></xref> because the provider cannot undo the event.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> representing the result.
